Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 w/Lenses
Reviews.Author: Karolyn Verde
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money. Takes great pictures and the extra lenses gives a lot of range for different views.  Very pleased with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Canon Eos SLR digital
Reviews.Author: Jerry W. Morgan
Reviews.Content: first camera purchase in a LLloooooonnngggg time...Have been wanting a digital slr for awhile, time was right, camera looked right, money was right...thanksI came, I saw, I bought....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Christina R Koeniguer
Reviews.Content: Love the camera, the long lens and an extra battery makes the kit complete. I don't use a lot of the other stuff. I went to a camera store for guidance on how to use the 2 small extra lenses, because nothing came with instructions besides the camera, and was told that I didn't need them because the 2 main lenses had did the same thing. So was disappointed that I have stuff I don't need.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with a not so good case!
Reviews.Author: gbertis
Reviews.Content: That's a really good deal for a camera. I recommend. The only question is the case, that is not so nice. The rest of staff is really nice!

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3 (1100D) SLR Digital Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Rechargeable LPE10 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Adapater
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital Memory Card + External Digital Slave SLR Flash
0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Carry Pouch and Caps + 2X Telephoto Lens w/ Carry Pounch and Caps
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + LPE10 Battery & Charger + Wide Angle Lens + Telephoto Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
